SageTVPlugin.Name: DVB / TTX Subtitles Playback
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Allows playback of DVB and Teletext subtitles for recordings made with DVBViewer Recorder or LM DVB Smart Recorder.
For enabling DVB and Teletext subtitles playback you'll need to also use a network recorder that extract subtitles in real time like DVBViewer Recorder or LM DVB Smart Recorder.
SageTVPlugin.Author: LM Gestion - StephaneM
